g.text: The gisMap holds the information on
the GIS. Single lsd objects can
the gisMap, as long as at least on
the 2d vector with dimension xn yn
holds all the gisPositions, if any.

Length of y dimension. y in [0,yn)

there are 2^4 options. We use a
